fr.escape.graphics

Interface TextureOperator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimationTexture, RepeatableScrollingTexture, ScrollingTexture

    public interface TextureOperator

    An interface for drawing complicated Texture

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, int x, int y, int width, int height, double angle)
      Draw a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        double angle)

        Draw a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        The portion of the Texture is defined by the implementation of this interface.

        Parameters:
        graphics - Use this Graphics2D for drawing.
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen.
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen.
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen.
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen.
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree (Optional)
